title: Would it be toxic to say "do you always fight so poorly" in All chat?
body:
https://youtu.be/fkhZo3KTeV4?t=57s

if it is, could I just keep spamming that?

replies.body: Probably. If you're not typing in the chatbox to either communicate game information, socialize, or barring that, lift up rather than put down, it's probably toxic.
